channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Educators Shouldn’t Accept Antisemitism in Their Teachers’ Unions
item.description: I left my teachers’ union because of its antisemitism. I hope more teachers join me.

item.title: Congress unveils spending plan after Trump calls on Republicans to avoid government shutdown
item.description: Republicans are unveiling a new plan to fund the government past the coming shutdown deadline next week.

item.title: We Need To Ban Idiots From Using Historical Analogies
item.description: Idiots like Russell Moore should abstain from using historical analogies in their pitiful attempts to influence the public discourse.
